The data is collected for the following purposes:

Personal data is only shared with the payment provider Stripe for secure transaction processing.

Personal data is retained for the legally required duration in compliance with accounting and fiscal obligations.

6. User Rights

In accordance with data protection legislation, you have the following rights:

  • Right to erasure: request the deletion of your personal data.
To exercise this right, please contact us at contact@gusto-manager.com.

7. Data Security

We make every effort to protect your personal data:

  • Frontend hosting: Vercel
  • Backend hosting: Render

Payments are processed by the provider Stripe. No banking data is stored on our servers.

This site does not use cookies or tracking technologies.

10. Supervisory Authority

In case of a complaint, you can contact the competent authority:

  • Commission Nationale de l’Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL)
  • Address: 3 Place de Fontenoy, TSA 80715, 75334 PARIS CEDEX 07
  • Phone: +33 1 53 73 22 22
  • Website: www.cnil.fr

11. Policy Updates

We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time to reflect legal or regulatory changes. If modifications are made, the update date will be indicated at the top of this document.

12. Contact

For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at: contact@gusto-manager.com.
